rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you.
rev.diff:
Line 18: Line 18:
===RoboCop===
===RoboCop===
â
[[Image:6000SUX.jpg|250px|thumb|6000 SUX parody advertisement from [[RoboCop]].]]
 
Parody advertisements are seen throughout the [[RoboCop (franchise)|RoboCop franchise]] for products such as the "6000 SUX", a car that gets 8.2 mpg<ref>[http://robocop.wikia.com/wiki/6000_SUX 6000 SUX at the RoboCop Wiki]</ref>, the game "NUKEM", a parody of [[Battleship (game)|Battleship]], and "Magnavolt", a car security system designed to electrocute and kill would-be carjackers.<ref>[http://www.ugo.com/therush/article/robocop---a-few-words-from-the-future/18 RoboCop - A Few Words From the Future]</ref>
Parody advertisements are seen throughout the [[RoboCop (franchise)|RoboCop franchise]] for products such as the "6000 SUX", a car that gets 8.2 mpg<ref>[http://robocop.wikia.com/wiki/6000_SUX 6000 SUX at the RoboCop Wiki]</ref>, the game "NUKEM", a parody of [[Battleship (game)|Battleship]], and "Magnavolt", a car security system designed to electrocute and kill would-be carjackers.<ref>[http://www.ugo.com/therush/article/robocop---a-few-words-from-the-future/18 RoboCop - A Few Words From the Future]</ref>
